import React from 'react'; import { Storage } from 'aws-amplify' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; import { Form, Header, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { API, graphqlOperation } from "aws-amplify"; import * as mutations from './graphql/mutations'; import RequestSchema from './saRequestSchema'; import { AutoField, AutoForm, ErrorsField, DateField, RadioField, LongTextField, SubmitField } from 'uniforms-semantic'; export default function RequestForm() { return (
handleAdd(doc)}>

); }
